# AudioUnit

**Type Alias**

The data type for a plug-in component that provides audio processing or audio data generation.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias AudioUnit = AudioComponentInstance
```

## Discussion

The various types of audio units are described in the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/1584142-audio_unit_types] enumeration. The subtypes of audio units provided by Apple are described in [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/1584145-converter_audio_unit_subtypes], [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/1584154-effect_audio_unit_subtypes], [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/1584150-mixer_audio_unit_subtypes], and [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/1584139-input_output_audio_unit_subtypes].

## Initializing the Audio Unit

- **AudioUnitInitialize(_:)**: Initializes an audio unit
- **AudioUnitUninitialize(_:)**: Uninitializes an audio unit.
- **AudioUnitProcess(_:_:_:_:_:)**
- **AudioUnitProcessMultiple(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)**
- **AudioUnitReset(_:_:_:)**: Resets an audio unit’s render state.

items.description: Resets an audio unit’s render state.
items.name: AudioUnitReset(_:_:_:)
